code: import{inMemoryToken}from"../Components/AuthContext";import jwt from"jsonwebtoken";function decodeJwtToken(){return jwt.decode(inMemoryToken);}function date(DateTime){var date;var time;date=DateTime.slice(0,10).split("-").reverse().join("/");time=DateTime.slice(11,16);return time+" "+date;}export{decodeJwtToken,date};
